item.title: Description
item.description: Description # Beam vr is a application which combines virtual an real reality.

item.title: Items
item.description: Items # This document lists all the items available and required for the beam vr application Tracker Equipment # Vive Tracker Vive Tracker Dongle Vive Tracker Dock Vive Tracker Foot Straps Vive Tracker Belt Straps Other # Vive VR Glasses Vive Controller USB C to USB A Cable Power Bank Micro USB to USB A Cable USB A to USB A Cable Vive Wireless Module Vive Video Cable Vive Glasses Protection Vive Lighthouse Vive Face Pillow Vive Head Pillow DCIN Cable Vive Box Pad Vive Face and Head Pillow Cleaning kit Vive Foamed Face Pillow Vive Foamed Head Pillow Vive Box

item.title: Setup
item.description: Setup # Beam vr is a application which combines virtual an real reality. 2. Start the application # start application

item.title: Start Application
item.description: Starting the application # Requisitions # Unity Hub Unity 2020.3.14f1 Steam Steam VR Preferred Way # The game is found in the Documents folder of the pc. Double click it and everything should work. If Steam Vr is not starting up, start it up manually. For starting steam vr look into SteamVR. Build it yourself # If the Application executable is not available you can build and run it yourself.

item.title: SteamVR
item.description: Starting steam vr # You can start steam vr manually if it wont start for some reason. Start up steam and click the VR icon in the top right corner.
